name: VeloCity Waterloo
overview:
VeloCity helps University of Waterloo students and alumni turn ideas into businesses; connecting them with the newest technology, mentors, and a vast network of entrepreneurs.

VeloCity consists of three programs: VeloCity Campus, Residence and Garage.

VeloCity Campus is about helping all entrepreneurially-inclined students at the University of Waterloo. The program gives interested students the practical, real world skills they need to start any kind of business by providing access to hands-on workshops and events.

The VeloCity Residence provides an opportunity for University of Waterloo students to live in an innovative and entrepreneurial environment right on campus. Students are given access to the latest technologies and the opportunity to learn from a great network of mentors and entrepreneurs. Students do not need an idea or team to apply, they just need to be passionate about entrepreneurship.

The VeloCity Garage houses University of Waterloo students and alumni who need free space and mentoring to kickstart their companies, giving them to opportunity to join other companies building successful startups to learn, collaborate and innovate.
